query:
SELECT 
  CHAR_LENGTH(content) as total_length,
  CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(content, '\n', '')) as length_without_newlines,
  CHAR_LENGTH(content) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(content, '\n', '')) as newline_count
FROM blog_posts 
WHERE slug = 'expert-cv-help-for-crafting-winning-resumes-effortlessly'
